author: A_Brickset_user
title: Great game!
review: I borrowed this game from someone and it is awesome!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! I love how everyone dances if you finish a level. TeeVee is the coolyest!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Charge and Flex have my favorite dance. Also, my favorite one of ogel's base is the Ogel Island Labratorys

author: A_Brickset_user
title: it's not what you expect, IT'S BETTER
review:
When I first played this game I expected it to be something like the Lego Island games (and I like Lego Island games) but it's not. It’s actually a problem solving game (and I really like problem solving games :oD). You start off just playing with direction tiles, gradually getting pieces that let you jump, slide down, climb up. It’s not until you get to Radia that it gets really interesting. From there you have to make precise placing to open the next door. Then you have to have power sources. We go on getting into electricity, motors and ropes, all the time your dodging Ogel’s guards and hoping that the next mission doesn't have a lurcher drone in it.
Oh by the way, there’s a big surprise for you when you finish the doom room, I can't spoil it but it makes me think we are going to have another Alpha Team theme (underground?).

author: A_Brickset_user
title: I got this set in Lego Masterpiece collection(cant beat the price).
review: pretty repetitive,but fun.I had expected a FPS (First Person Shooter) type game where instead it is a top view stratagy game.It is definitly not as good as Lego Rock Raider as far as strategy.It still is fun.

author: A_Brickset_user
title: This game is great!
review: Dash, the leader of the Alpha Team, must rescue his friends from the clutches of Ogel and stop Ogel's scheme for world domination. As you progress through this game and rescue different team members, you get different tools to help you through Ogel's lairs. The game really gets interesting after you get Radia. The locks on the doors change throughout the game. There is a surprise after you shut down the D.O.O.M. machine. This overall recieves from me 10/10.

author: Legonat
title: It is pretty cool.
review:
• This game did not disappoint me.


            Pros

            It is fun to figure out,

            It has a lot of levels,

            It makes a great addition to alpha team collections,

            Pretty good graphics

 
           Cons

           The people don't look like they do in sets,

           The game is not at all like LEGO Star Wars,

           The game gets repetitive,

           It is hard on some levels,

           You should do stuff the alpha team does in the comics like ride vehicles and battle
           Ogel and his drones

          
          Overall a 5/5
   

          

            

  •
